alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Paz County through 715 PM MST... At 627 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vicksburg, or 31 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quartzsite, Salome, Brenda, Vicksburg Junction, Wenden, Vicksburg, Harcuvar and Bouse. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 23 and 54. US Highway 60 between mile markers 31 and 65. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 27 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
